title: A walk through the woods
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What did she say? She said (that)she had a walk last weekend.
听录音，然后回答问题。她说什么了？她说她上周末去散步了。

text_and_translation.text: Last week I went to the theatre.
What did you do after the play?
I didn't go home. I went for a long walk in the park.
text_and_translation.translation: 我没回家。我在公园里散了很长时间的步。

text_and_translation.text: What did you do after the park?
text_and_translation.translation: 离开公园后你又做了什么？

text_and_translation.text: I went down to the river and I sat down to have my picnic lunch.
text_and_translation.translation: 我下到河边坐下来野餐。

text_and_translation.text: Picnic lunch! That's interesting. Did you enjoy it?
text_and_translation.translation: 野餐午餐！真有趣。你喜欢吗？

text_and_translation.text: Yes, I like picnics very much. They're very relaxing.
text_and_translation.translation: 是的，我非常喜欢野餐。它们非常放松。

text_and_translation.text: Where did you go for your picnic?
I didn't go anywhere. I had my picnic in the park.
text_and_translation.translation: 我没去任何地方。我在公园里野餐。

text_and_translation.text: In the park! That's funny. You had a picnic in the park before lunch and a picnic in the park after lunch!
text_and_translation.translation: 在公园里！真有趣。你在午饭前在公园里野餐，午饭后又在公园里野餐！

text_and_translation.text: I know. It was fun. By the way, did you go to the cinema last weekend?
text_and_translation.translation: 我知道。很有趣。顺便问一下，你上周末去电影院了吗？

text_and_translation.text: No, I usually rest at home on Sundays. I watch television or read books.
text_and_translation.translation: 没有，我通常在周日在家休息。我看电视或阅读书籍。

text_and_translation.text: What do you do on Sunday evenings?
I don't go out on Sunday evenings. I enjoy staying at home. I think it's the best way to relax.
text_and_translation.translation: 我周日晚上不出门。我喜欢待在家里。我认为这是最好的放松方式。

notes.title: A walk through the woods
notes.describe: 这个短语表示通过树林的一次步行，课文中描述了一个人在周末进行的各种活动，包括去剧院、散步和野餐等。

notes.title: Picnic lunch
notes.describe: 野餐午餐是指在户外进行的用餐，课文中提到的人物在公园里进行了两次野餐，一次在午饭前，一次在午饭后。
